name: Bruno's Adventures
description:
Bruno's Adventures is 2d action platformer game.Here the player has to help the main character, bruno to dodge various obstacles and reach the end. Collect various types of coins to score more points. There are 3 types of coins in this game. Copper coins give you 25 points, silver gives 50 points and gold gives 100 points. But its not so simple as it sounds.  

There are 2 levels.  

Level 1 is full of various  obstacles and  level 2 contains boss fight, which I am not gonna lie is usually kinda hard actually.

 GOOD LUCK! 

This game contains a lot of bugs as I am new to this industry, so please leave any positive  feedback below in the comments.
